name: Morkkabeans 1.1
description:
A new religion has arisen in the desert. Worshiping the Unnamable God of Names, blaspheming against SHE and HE, promising the revolt.  Galgenbeck has sent its inquisitors.  The half-giant Nephilim walk the earth. If you join them, almost certain death awaits.

◾◼⬛The Revolt⬛◼◾

(a fully-fledged adventure) +

⚔Artifacts like the ◾◼⬛Staff of Aaron⬛◼◾,  ◾◼⬛Sword of Moshe⬛◼◾
💀 Beasts like the ◾◼⬛Estrie, Lillim, Werewolves, Ziz, and Shamir Worms⬛◼◾
🕊 Nephilim
📜 New Scrolls, New Classes, and did we mention a host of random tables?!

This game requires the rules for Mork Borg to play, the rules and other Mork Borg content such as character sheets and more can be downloaded for free at https://morkborg.com/content/
